title: Online Instructional Design for Enhancing Health & Beauty Consultant Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Dermatology and Beauty Care Theory
context.additional_context: Practical non-formal vocational training programs for current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret skin analysis results to develop personalized health and beauty management plans
Learners can submit project deliverables reflecting 21st-century workplace competencies (creative/critical thinking, collaboration)
Learners can integrate the five core competencies (knowledge, skills, attitudes, innovation, social responsibility) in health and beauty fields through online learning modules
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
